column4: ... you can mount an .iso file with mount? and have it completely uncompress and auto run all the info properly with full controls? if that works it's serious news to me
you can :-) iso, nrg, maybe cue, but i'm not sure about that last one
well once again, something linux can do that flabergasts me. thank you :P
just, search google for a script to do that automatically, and add it to the scripts folder/context menu (via nautilus-actions)
